channel.title: Three problems (using richscape v1.2)
channel.description:
1) i put in the invincible command (well, tried to) and this came up in the compiler: [code]:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03 :: Results: client.java:4026: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client startAnimation(1972); ^ client.java:4034: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client startAnimation(404); ^ client.java:13346: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client if(IsDead) ^ client.java:13347: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client IsDead = false; ^ client.java:13352: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client if(IsDead) ^ client.java:13353: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client IsDead = true; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
2) also, im trying to make the wepdelay of the dark bow shorter, but i cant find where it is in richscape. i know it's not in client.java; i searched for "wepDelay" and "wep", so where?
3) i know that richscape has a cave taking you to the dragons, but in the source, it isnt there for me. where do i get it?
thx, R4ND0M

item.title: Three problems (using richscape v1.2)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Change startAnimation to setAnimation

and try changing the I in IsDead to i

Read full topic

item.title: Three problems (using richscape v1.2)
item.dc:creator: @R4ND0M R4ND0M
item.description:
@R4ND0M wrote:

  1. i put in the invincible command (well, tried to) and this came up in the compiler:

:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_03 :: Results: client.java:4026: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client startAnimation(1972); ^ client.java:4034: cannot find symbol symbol : method startAnimation(int) location: class client startAnimation(404); ^ client.java:13346: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client if(IsDead) ^ client.java:13347: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client IsDead = false; ^ client.java:13352: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client if(IsDead) ^ client.java:13353: cannot find symbol symbol : variable IsDead location: class client IsDead = true; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 6 errors :: Done! Press any key to continue . . .

  1. also, im trying to make the wepdelay of the dark bow shorter, but i cant find where it is in richscape. i know it’s not in client.java; i searched for “wepDelay” and “wep”, so where?

  2. i know that richscape has a cave taking you to the dragons, but in the source, it isnt there for me. where do i get it?

thx,
R4ND0M
